title: Brittany Cartwright Of Vanderpump Rules On Weight Loss, Reality TV, Jenny Craig, Hooters, & All Things Vanderpump
itunes:title: Brittany Cartwright Of Vanderpump Rules On Weight Loss, Reality TV, Jenny Craig, Hooters, & All Things Vanderpump
description:
#484: On today's episode we are joined by Brittany Cartwright. Brittany is a reality television star best known for her time on the wildly popular Vanderpump Rules. She is also an acctress, model, wife, and mother. On today's episode we discuss Brittany's experience on television, her weight loss journey, Jenny Craig, motherhood, and all things Vanderpump Rules. 

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE

For Detailed Show Notes visit TSCPODCAST.COM

To Call the Him & Her Hotline call: 1-833-SKINNYS (754-6697)

Check Out Lauryn's NEW BOOK, Get The Fuck Out Of The Sun HERE

Get your own today at www.higherdose.com You can use promo code SKINNY15 at checkout to save 15% off or just go to www.higherdose.com/skinny to save 15% off.

The Hot Mess Ice Roller is here to help you contour, tighten, and de-puff your facial skin and It's paired alongside the Ice Queen Facial Oil which is packed with anti-oxidants that penetrates quickly to help hydrate, firm, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, leaving skin soft and supple. To check them out visit www.shopskinnyconfidential.com now.
